00028 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00029 {
00030   createinfo(argc, argv);
00031 
00032   /* enough arguments ? */
00033 
00034   if (argc < 4) {
00035     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s PROJPARA MBSTATE MBSTATE\n",
00036             filepart(argv[0]));
00037     exit(-1);
00038   }
00039 
00040   int odd;
00041 
00042   char* projpar = argv[optind];
00043   char** mbfile = &argv[optind+1];
00044 
00045   MultiSlaterDet MSD[2];
00046   Indices In[2];
00047 
00048   // strip possible indices from filename 
00049   int i;
00050   for (i=0; i<2; i++) {
00051     extractIndicesfromString(&mbfile[i], &In[i]);
00052     if (readMultiSlaterDetfromFile(&MSD[i], &In[i], mbfile[i]))
00053       exit(-1);
00054   }
00055 
00056   // odd numer of nucleons ?
00057   odd = MSD[0].A % 2;
00058 
00059   // Projection parameters
00060   Projection P;
00061   initProjection(&P, odd, projpar);
00062 
00063   _setangkappacrit(25.0);
00064 
00065   // initialize space for matrix elements
00066   complex double*** ovlme = initprojectedMultiMBME(&P, &OpOvlap,
00067                                                   &MSD[0], &MSD[1]);
00068   
00069   if (readprojectedMultiMBMEfromFile(mbfile[0], mbfile[1], &MSD[0], &MSD[1],
00070                                      &P, &OpOvlap, ovlme)) {
00071     calcprojectedMultiMBME(&P, &OpOvlap, &MSD[0], &MSD[1], ovlme);
00072     writeprojectedMultiMBMEtoFile(mbfile[0], mbfile[1], &MSD[0], &MSD[1], 
00073                                   &P, &OpOvlap, ovlme);
00074   }
00075   else 
00076     fprintf(stderr, "... matrix elements have already been calculated\n");
00077 
00078   return 0;
